snippet: Despite worries to the contrary, too-big-to-fail institutions may not be prisoners of their own or regulators’ devices in perpetuity.
lead_paragraph: Despite worries to the contrary, too-big-to-fail institutions may not be prisoners of their own or regulators’ devices in perpetuity.

headline.main: Dodd-Frank’s Hotel California May Have Exit After All
